summary: Successfully improved the spreadsheet grid layout and styling. Enhanced cell dimensions (w-32, h-10), improved text readability (text-sm), added better padding and spacing, prevented text wrapping, improved column headers with shadows and borders, fixed dropdown positioning, and maintained consistent sizing across all grid elements. The spreadsheet now has a professional appearance with better data visibility.
current_status: Spreadsheet grid is now properly styled and functional. Search functionality works with mock data, initialization errors are resolved, and the grid provides excellent readability and user experience. Ready for comprehensive testing of search results population in the improved grid layout.
